About Soumitra Goswami

AMFI Registered Mutual Fund Distributor: ARN-309045

With over 5 years of experience in financial planning and investment advisory, I help individuals and families achieve their financial goals through strategic planning and smart investment decisions.

My approach combines deep market knowledge with personalized service to ensure every client receives tailored solutions that align with their risk profile and financial objectives.
